name: Carnival Chaos
description:
MESMERIZING THRILLING CARNIVAL CHAOS DESCRIPTION

Hop-in for a first-person shooter roller coaster thrilling experience!

Dive in a winding, twisting, turning, outer space ride whilst blasting away a variety of obstacles and beating your highest score!

FEATURES
  • First-person shooter on a roller coaster thrilling ride
  • Engage in outer space / carnival theme environment and survive all obstacles and dangers
  • Test your reflexes and try to score as much as possible
FACTSHEET Developer:

Cécile Roux  & Eliah Smith

Development & date:

Unreal | 2020

Platforms:

Windows with mouse

Audience:

7+

HISTORY

This project focuses on a level design and has been developed over 6 weeks by one designer and one programmer. And while it is still in its early stage, we hope that you will still enjoy the ride!

CREDITS
  • Soundtrack: MusicDog

  • Programmer:                Eliah Smith  >   https://squeeltoe.itch.io/
CONTACT

HIGHLIGHTS

Carnival Chaos was selected to be showcased by Billy Blue College of Design 2020 games Twitch.TV
